May 6, 1984 D Buxton Festival (Section A)
Buxton Festival (Section A) 101 Test Piece Contest Buxton Festival buxton-festival-section-a
A French Suite
Octagon Theatre, Pavilion Gardens, Buxton Prizes - 1st £150 and trophy, 2nd £100 and trophy, 3rd £70 and trophy. 4 bands competed. 21st annual contest.
Oct. 3, 2014, 2:57 p.m. Jan. 14, 2015, 10:15 a.m.
1 Lancashire Brass Roy Bentham
2 Skelmersdale Prize Band G. M. Davies
3 Greenway Selectus Band P. Bateman
4 Burbage Buxton Band Don Redfern
